General.Name: Teladan Setia Group Bhd
General.Description: Teladan Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development business in Malaysia. The company develops and sells residential and commercial properties. It also involved in the management consultancy and building construction activities, as well as generates electric energy. The company was formerly known as Teladan Setia Group Berhad and changed its name to Teladan Group Berhad in June 2023. Teladan Group Berhad was founded in 1997 and is based in Batu Berendam, Malaysia.
